ygData.subject: Re: AAAAAKKKK!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sounds like you re on the bad side of the Internet (all is relative, as someone more famous than I said once). It happened twice for me since I got EQ.
ygData.messageBody:
According to Bob:
> I don't know what happened but I cant seem to get into the game anymore.
> After I select my guy, I hit enter world and then after about a minute, I
> get the 'Server not responding" message. I have reinstalled and repatched

Sounds like you're on the bad side of the Internet (all is relative, as
someone more famous than I said once).

It happened twice for me since I got EQ. Both times, there was a banner
on the login server saying that either CERF.net had router problem, or
Earthlink "customers" had too. (I am not an earthlink customer, but somehow
my connectivity goes thru them when reaching CERF).

Usual symptom: if you are on a UUNET server (old servers), try a CERFnet
server (a recent one). If you can get in, then you have "transient"
connectivity block. Sweat it out :(

(my symptoms are usually: can't log in Tunare or Quellious. Click on Bertox,
and I get in. I then switch off the computer and head to bed :)

--
